conversion_verification.notes: Walls have significant height and thickness. The interior volume is clearly discernible. The view is isometric, and the roof is removed to show the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness (5/5). Floors are clearly separated planes (3/3). Interior volume is clearly perceivable (4/4). Proper 3D wall corner geometry (3/3). Angled view is good (5/5). Interior visible from an elevated perspective (3/3). Minimal severe perspective distortion (2/2). Roof/ceiling is cleanly removed (5/5). Interior spaces are fully visible (3/3). Clean geometry without broken sections (2/2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms (3/3). Correct adjacency relationships (4/4). Relative room proportions preserved (3/3). Major wall positions align well (5/5). Wall lengths are proportional (3/3). Internal partitions are correctly placed (2/2). Doors are present and on correct walls (4/4). Windows are present and on correct walls, though some 2D windows are missing in the 3D (1/2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented, though some are missing (1/2).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (bed, sofa, tables) (4/4). Kitchen elements present (2/2). Bathroom fixtures present (2/2). Furniture placed in correct rooms (3/3). Furniture scale reasonable relative to room (2/2). Orientation logical relative to layout (1/2) - the living room couch and TV are oriented slightly differently than the 2D layout. The living room chair is replaced by a TV stand and the L-shaped bench is replaced with a single chair.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, openings clearly distinguishable (4/4). Geometry readable and not visually confusing (4/4). Interior clearly visible (3/3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3/3). Consistent material usage (2/2). No major rendering artifacts or broken meshes (2/2). Clean background / presentation (0/2) - The background is a solid color, but there's a small white outline on the bottom right which could be a minor artifact. The presentation could be better with a less stark background.

detected_errors.description: Some windows from the 2D floor plan are missing in the 3D render (e.g., in the kitchen/living area and bedroom).

The orientation of the living room couch and TV is slightly different from the 2D plan. Some furniture items in the living/kitchen area are different (L-shaped bench vs. single chair, extra chair in Kitchen/Living area, no chair next to the sofa).

summary: The 3D render successfully transforms the 2D plan into a clear isometric view with good fidelity to the original layout, despite a few minor discrepancies in window placement and furniture details.
